ModMetaData.name: RimLex - UI Text Localizer
ModMetaData.author: COR+
ModMetaData.description:
RimLex is a runtime localization framework for RimWorld UI. It automatically detects English text on-screen, collects it, and replaces it with translations from a simple TSV dictionary.
### Features - Real-time dictionary-based translation (ApplyDictAtRuntime) - Automatic collection of untranslated English text - Per-mod export and unified aggregate lists - Mod settings menu for easy reload and organization - Safe, lightweight Harmony patching with full compatibility
RimLex enables any mod—even those without translation keys— to display natural localized text.
